name: Dantes Inferno Canto 1
description:
Dantes Inferno Cantos 1

Dantes Inferno is a story-based visual novel made in less than a week. This was mostly a test to see if I was able to finish a project.

This was my first time coding and, I'm pretty proud of it.

Content Warnings:

-Suicide/self-harm

-Death

-Hell/Heaven
